name: The Standard Hua Hin
detail: The pool area is exceptional and relaxing with ocean view.
area: Hua Hin City Center,Hua Hin / Cha-am - View on map

name: RELO' The Urban Escape
detail: If you planning to spend your holiday or looking for a typical boutique hotel in Hua Hin. You should consider Haven as one of your top choices. Haven is still new but managed with professional offer great services. The location is beautiful and private. I think this is a great place for a relaxing day.
area: Hua Hin Beachfront,Hua Hin / Cha-am - View on map

name: Resort De Paskani
detail: Everything was good about Resort De Paskani, very nice staff at the reception, room was great and it was different from most of the hotels that I had stayed before, you get the feel of Santorini here. Love the breakfast and coffee, staffs at the restaurant were very nice. Two nights were too short, will come back and stay here in my future visit to Hua Hin. Beautiful place to stay, short walk to the beach and easy to get grab car to go anywhere in Hua Hin. Thank you very much to all the lovely staffs at Resort De Paskani for making my stay a memorable one.
area: Khao Takiab Beach Front,Hua Hin / Cha-am - View on map

name: The Regent Cha-Am Beach Resort, Hua Hin
detail: Stayed here before and visited 2years later, really enjoyed stay again. Resort with everything on site, beach, 2 pools, many restaurants, tennis, gym. There are also few (quiet) bars/restaurants 5mins walk away if you want to eat somewhere else. Location is inbetween cha am and hua hin so can't walk to town, but taxi available for 200/300bht.
area: Cha Am Beachfront,Hua Hin / Cha-am - View on map

name: Hisea Huahin Hotel
detail: We found Hisea Hua Hin Hotel by chance when we we're talking to a local across the street from the hotel. We told her that we're searching for another hotel to stay at for the remaining 3 more weeks of vacation in Hua Hin. She immediately pointed to Hisea Hua Hin Hotel across the street which according to her, just barely opened for business. We decided to check it out right there and then, and we were lucky to meet the owner himself who showed us around. Hisea Hua Hin Hotel is definitely a jewel of a find, for its highly detailed facilities, tasteful decor, furnishings, amenities, friendly and helpful staffs, and for the price! Additionally, the location is perfect and within walking distance to a lot of Hua Hin's city center places of interest, and the beautiful Hua Hin beach! We've looked at many hotels in the area prior to visiting Hisea Hua Hin Hotel and nothing beats Hisea Hua Hin Hotel for what it offers, the price, location, and the staff. Being that it's brand new, it's absolutely immaculate! Although it's low season and therefore it's not fully booked, I see housekeeping clean every rooms everyday! The beds are the most comfortable we've ever found during our 3 months of travel in Asia, and the owner accommodates our needs to the best that he can. Case in point, I wanted an electric fan in my room due to my special need for it, and he happily obliged without question although the A/C in his hotel works perfectly. The staff are very attentive and helpful, and the owner is a hands on kind of a businessman. He's always around and can easily be reached and easy to talk to. Now, this is not the Hilton or Centara, but it doesn't have the high price of those 2 either and for all the quality service and amenities Hisea Hua Hin offers, it just can't be beat! Lastly, I would like to add that I have worked for big 5 star hotels in Las Vegas as a V.I.P. Associate for 5 years, therefore, I know a jewel of a find when I see one when it comes to hotels, amenities,
area: Hua Hin City Center,Hua Hin / Cha-am - View on map

name: City Beach Resort
detail: Though we live in Hua Hin we stay here regularly if we're attending an event, this time it was the local Jazz Festival on the beach. The hotel is large, as are the rooms, and whilst it's comfortable the rooms are very tired, with wallpaper peeling off the walls. As we booked at the last moment we booked via Agoda and paid on arrival, I was a little concerned that after my card had been processed and payment authorised, the lady on reception copied my card details onto a peice of paper, I thought the numbers were blocked out for a reason, the security of the account, she was interested in my concerns. Check-out, as always is painfully slow whilst you have to wait whilst they get someone to check your room. The hotel is ok for the odd night, but probably not for an extended stay, though we would certainly stay there again.
area: Hua Hin City Center,Hua Hin / Cha-am - View on map

name: Wyndham Hua Hin Pranburi Resort & Villas
detail: Glad we managed to experience the awesome ambience here.
area: Pranburi,Hua Hin / Cha-am - View on map

name: Hilton Hua Hin Resort & Spa
detail: If you would like to spend your vacation, I think Hilton Hua Hin Resort and Spa Hua Hin / Cha-am is a good choice to stay; reasonable price, location, service, facilities, swimming pool, ocean view room . . . I could be able to walk around the hotel area where surrounding with Local Shop - Local Restaurant, especially seafood restaurant. If I have a chance to visit Hua Hin / Cha-am once again, I think I will stay at Hilton Hua Hin Resort and Spa Hua Hin / Cha-am. Thank you . . .
area: Hua Hin Beachfront,Hua Hin / Cha-am - View on map

name: Maven Stylish Hotel Hua Hin
detail: We really enjoyed our stay at Maven Stylish Hotel Hua Hin. We stayed in a deluxe room which was spacious. Everything was clean and modern. In the room, there were lots of plugs for charging devices, plus robes & slippers, and the wifi was fast. The bed was comfortable and the room was spotless. The swimming pool is small but it was fine for us. The gym is quite small with limited machines, so not the best for those wanting a serious workout. As for the buffet breakfast, it's pretty basic but reasonable for the size of the hotel. The location is great - you can walk to the street market, and to many restaurants and shops. The staff were very nice and helpful. We recommend the hotel, and hope to come back again.
area: Hua Hin City Center,Hua Hin / Cha-am - View on map

name: Chalelarn Hotel
detail: my husband and i spent 2 night at this wonderful new boutique hotel in hua hin, we now wish we had booked a longer stay. the hotel is only a couple of streets walk from the night market, shopping and plenty of restaurants to choose from. it only took us 5 minutes to walk to the beach, so the location is perfect. when we arrived we were promptly checked in and taken to our room, all the rooms have a different theme and have all been done in a very tasteful manner. next time we visit hua hin which we will we would definately book to stay at this hotel again.
area: Hua Hin City Center,Hua Hin / Cha-am - View on map
